id.description: Random 64-bit unique identifier for this game

opponent.description: Human identifier for the team. App prompts for the name of the opposing team. May not be unique.

date.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds when the game was created, not necessarily played.

scoreUs.description: Number of runs scored by this team in this game

scoreThem.description: Number of runs scored by this team's opponent in this game

lineupType.description: The type of the lineup used for this game. Typically this is a team-wide setting but specifying it under games allows for exceptions (e.g. tournaments w/ different rules). Different lineup types have different rules about what makes them valid (e.g. ALTERNATING_GENDER lineup must never bat two males or two females in a row)

plateAppearances.description: All plate appearances that occurred during this game
